comments: Spends the whole lecture talking about himself and rarely ends up explaining something that the class will find useful. Everything is learned from the labs and homework assignments.

I did learn how to use some advanced features of CATIA and NX from this course. He did a really bad job at the other part of the course that involves theory about PLM. He got into long life stories about his experiences, and never got to the point. I had no idea what was going on in lecture, but labs were interesting.

Single worst teaching experience in my life. Told us to spend $200 on online tutorials, graded those, and proceeded to not even teach us a thing. Doesn\'t respond to questions well. Not sure if he even has a degree.
Dr. Hartman is challenging, and engaging. Great teacher to have.

Professor is bad about keeping the online schedule correct and accurate to the class. It\'s common for it to be fixed and wording is often confusing. Expectations of what is supposed to be done and when is confusing as well.
